participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

IPAQ_01.LongName: Do you currently have a job or do any unpaid work outside your home?

IPAQ_02.LongName: During the <u>last 7 days</u>, on how many days did you do <u>vigorous</u> physical activities like heavy lifting, digging, heavy construction, or climbing up stairs as <u>part of your work</u>? Think about only those physical activities that you did for at least 10 minutes at a time.

IPAQ_04.LongName:
How much time did you usually spend on one of those days doing vigorous physical activities as part of your work?
Enter hours here and minutes below:

IPAQ_06.LongName: Again, think about only those physical activities that you did for at least 10 minutes at a time. During the <u>last 7 days</u>, on how many days did you do <u>moderate</u> physical activities like carrying light loads <u>as part of your work</u>? Please do not include walking.

IPAQ_08.LongName:
How much time did you usually spend on one of those days doing moderate physical activities as part of your work?
Enter hours here and minutes below:

IPAQ_10.LongName: During the <u>last 7 days</u>, on how many days did you <u>walk</u> for at least 10 minutes at a time <u>as part of your work</u>? Please do not count any walking you did to travel to or from work.

IPAQ_12.LongName:
How much time did you usually spend on one of those days walking as part of your work?
Enter hours here and minutes below:

IPAQ_14.LongName: During the <u>last 7 days</u>, on how many days did you <u>travel in a motor vehicle</u> like a train, bus, car, or tram?

Levels.0: No traveling in a motor vehicle

IPAQ_16.LongName:
How much time did you usually spend on one of those days traveling in a train, bus, car, tram, or other kind of motor vehicle?
Enter hours here and minutes below:

IPAQ_18.LongName: During the <u>last 7 days</u>, on how many days did you <u>bicycle</u> for at least 10 minutes at a time to go <u>from place to place</u>?

IPAQ_20.LongName:
How much time did you usually spend on one of those days to bicycle from place to place?
Enter hours here and minutes below:

IPAQ_22.LongName: During the <u>last 7 days</u>, on how many days did you <u>walk</u> for at least 10 minutes at a time to go <u>from place to place</u>?

IPAQ_24.LongName:
How much time did you usually spend on one of those days walking from place to place?
Enter hours here and minutes below:

IPAQ_26.LongName: Think about only those physical activities that you did for at least 10 minutes at a time. During the <u>last 7 days</u>, on how many days did you do <u>vigorous</u> physical activities like heavy lifting, chopping wood, shoveling snow, or digging <u>in the garden or yard</u>?

IPAQ_28.LongName:
How much time did you usually spend on one of those days doing vigorous physical activities in the garden or yard?
Enter hours here and minutes below:

IPAQ_30.LongName: Again, think about only those physical activities that you did for at least 10 minutes at a time. During the <u>last 7 days</u>, on how many days did you do <u>moderate</u> activities like carrying light loads, sweeping, washing windows, and raking <u>in the garden or yard</u>?

IPAQ_32.LongName:
How much time did you usually spend on one of those days doing moderate physical activities in the garden or yard?
Enter hours here and minutes below:

IPAQ_34.LongName: Once again, think about only those physical activities that you did for at least 10 minutes at a time. During the <u>last 7 days</u>, on how many days did you do <u>moderate</u> activities like carrying light loads, washing windows, scrubbing floors and sweeping <u>inside your home</u>?

IPAQ_36.LongName:
How much time did you usually spend on one of those days doing moderate physical activities inside your home?
Enter hours here and minutes below:

IPAQ_38.LongName: Not counting any walking you have already mentioned, during the <u>last 7 days</u>, on how many days did you <u>walk</u> for at least 10 minutes at a time <u>in your leisure time</u>?

IPAQ_40.LongName:
How much time did you usually spend on one of those days walking in your leisure time?
Enter hours here and minutes below:

IPAQ_42.LongName: Think about only those physical activities that you did for at least 10 minutes at a time. During the <u>last 7 days</u>, on how many days did you do <u>vigorous</u> physical activities like aerobics, running, fast bicycling, or fast swimming <u>in your leisure time</u>?

IPAQ_44.LongName:
How much time did you usually spend on one of those days doing vigorous physical activities in your leisure time?
Enter hours here and minutes below:

IPAQ_46.LongName: Again, think about only those physical activities that you did for at least 10 minutes at a time. During the <u>last 7 days</u>, on how many days did you do <u>moderate</u> physical activities like bicycling at a regular pace, swimming at a regular pace, and doubles tennis <u>in your leisure time</u>?

IPAQ_48.LongName:
How much time did you usually spend on one of those days doing moderate physical activities in your leisure time?
Enter hours here and minutes below:

IPAQ_50.LongName:
During the last 7 days, how much time did you usually spend sitting on a weekday?
Enter hours here and minutes below:

IPAQ_52.LongName:
During the last 7 days, how much time did you usually spend sitting on a weekend day?
Enter hours here and minutes below:

IPAQ_54.Description: Walking MET-minutes/week at work = 3.3 * walking minutes * walking days at work | Calculation = 3.3 * (([IPAQ_12] * 60) + ([IPAQ_13]*15)) * [IPAQ_10]

IPAQ_55.Description: Moderate MET-minutes/week at work = 4.0 * moderate-intensity activity minutes * moderate intensity days at work | Calculation = 4 * (([IPAQ_08] * 60) + ([(IPAQ_9]*15)) * [IPAQ_06]

IPAQ_56.Description: Vigorous MET-minutes/week at work = 8.0 * vigorous-intensity activity minutes * vigorous-intensity days at work | Calculation = 8 * (([IPAQ_04] * 60) + ([IPAQ_05]*15)) * [IPAQ_02]

IPAQ_57.Description: Total Work MET-minutes/week = sum of Walking + Moderate + Vigorous MET-minutes/week scores at work | Calculation = [IPAQ_54] + [IPAQ_55] + [IPAQ_56]

IPAQ_58.Description: Walking MET-minutes/week for transport = 3.3 * walking minutes * walking days for transportation | Calculation = 3.3 * (([IPAQ_24] * 60) + ([IPAQ_25]*15)) * [IPAQ_22]

IPAQ_59.Description: Cycle MET-minutes/week for transport = 6.0 * cycling minutes * cycle days for transportation | Calculation = 6 * (([IPAQ_20] * 60) + ([IPAQ_21]*15)) * [IPAQ_18]

IPAQ_60.Description: Total Transport MET-minutes/week = sum of Walking + Cycling MET-minutes/week scores for transportation | Calculation = [IPAQ_58] + [IPAQ_59]

IPAQ_61.LongName: Domestic and Garden Domain Vigorous MET
IPAQ_61.Description: Vigorous MET-minutes/week yard chores = 5.5 * vigorous-intensity activity minutes * vigorous-intensity days doing yard work (Notes: the MET value of 5.5 indicates that vigorous garden/yard work should be considered a moderate-intensity activity for scoring and computing total moderate intensity activities) | Calculation = 5.5 * (([IPAQ_28] * 60) + ([IPAQ_29]*15)) * [IPAQ_26]

IPAQ_62.LongName: Domestic and Garden Domain Moderate Yard MET
IPAQ_62.Description: Moderate MET-minutes/week yard chores = 4.0 * moderate-intensity activity minutes * moderate-intensity days doing yard work | Calculation = 4 * (([IPAQ_32] * 60) + ([IPAQ_33]*15)) * [IPAQ_30]

IPAQ_63.LongName: Domestic and Garden Domain Moderate Indoor MET
IPAQ_63.Description: Moderate MET-minutes/week inside chores = 3.0 * moderate-intensity activity minutes * moderate-intensity days doing inside chores | Calculation = 3 * (([IPAQ_36] * 60) + ([IPAQ_37]*15)) * [IPAQ_34]

IPAQ_64.LongName: Total Domestic and Garden Domain MET
IPAQ_64.Description: Total Domestic and Garden MET-minutes/week = sum of Vigorous yard + Moderate yard + Moderate inside chores MET-minutes/week scores | Calculation = [IPAQ_61] + [IPAQ_62] + [IPAQ_63]

IPAQ_65.Description: Walking MET-minutes/week leisure = 3.3 * walking minutes * walking days in leisure | Calculation = 3.3 * (([IPAQ_40] * 60) + ([IPAQ_41]*15)) * [IPAQ_38]

IPAQ_66.Description: Moderate MET-minutes/week leisure = 4.0 * moderate-intensity activity minutes * moderate-intensity days in leisure | Calculation = 4.0 * (([IPAQ_48] * 60) + ([IPAQ_49]*15)) * [IPAQ_46]

IPAQ_67.Description: Vigorous MET-minutes/week leisure = 8.0 * vigorous-intensity activity minutes * vigorous-intensity days in leisure | Calculation = 8 * (([IPAQ_44] * 60) + ([IPAQ_45]*15)) * [IPAQ_42]

IPAQ_68.Description: Total Leisure-Time MET-minutes/week = sum of Walking + Moderate + Vigorous MET-minutes/week scores in leisure | Calculation = [IPAQ_65] + [IPAQ_66] + [IPAQ_67]

IPAQ_69.Description: Total Walking MET-minutes/week = Walking MET-minutes/week (at Work + for Transport + in Leisure) | Calculation = [IPAQ_54] + [IPAQ_58] + [IPAQ_65]

IPAQ_70.Description: Total Moderate MET-minutes/week total = Moderate MET-minutes/week (at Work + Yard chores + inside chores + in Leisure time) + Cycling MET-minutes/week for Transport + Vigorous Yard chores MET-minutes/week (Note: Cycling MET value and Vigorous garden/yard work MET value fall within the coding range of moderate-intensity activities) | Calculation = [IPAQ_55] + [IPAQ_59] + [IPAQ_61] + [IPAQ_62] + [IPAQ_63] + [IPAQ_66]

IPAQ_71.Description: Total Vigorous MET-minutes/week = Vigorous MET-minutes/week (at Work + in Leisure) | Calculation = [IPAQ_56] + [IPAQ_67]

IPAQ_72.Description: Overall total physical activity MET-minutes/week score = sum of Total (walking + Moderate + Vigorous) MET-minutes/week scores = sum of Total Work + Total Transport + Total Domestic and Garden + Total Leisure-Time MET-minutes/week scores | Calculation = [IPAQ_69] + [IPAQ_70] + [IPAQ_71]
